page.title: 05Birchwood Shopping Centre
page.content: Birchwood Shopping Centre opened in November 1980.It took 4 years to build and cost about 5 million pounds.There are 42 shops,a hyper-market,a super-market,a Health Centre,a pub and several cafes.All the carparks have pictures of animals as well as numbers because it is easier to remember an animal.They got the idea from Disneyland.The centre is next to the railway station.Birchwood Station is only the second new railway station to be bulit since the war.The shops are all inside so the rain does not wet you. The buses stop close to the entrance too.Lots of people come to shop at Birchwood. It is near three motorways,the M6,M62 and M56.
